title: Krateo v2 Composable Portal lab
description: Let's learn how to work with Krateo Composable Portal

steps.title: Install Krateo PlatformOps Installer Helm chart
Add a Composition to the Kubernetes Cluster
Add Krateo FormTemplate to retrieve the Composition
Add RBAC to retrieve the FormTemplate
Add Krateo CardTemplate to retrieve the FormTemplate
Add Krateo Column and Row to retrieve the CardTemplate
